sen.j: 瑞光寺（ずいこうじ）は、京都市伏見区にある日蓮宗の寺。
sen.e: Zuiko-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Sect located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Zuiko-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Sect located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Zuiko-ji Temple is a Buddhist temple belonging to the Nichiren Sect located in Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 元政庵（げんせいあん）とも称される。
sen.e: It is also known as Gensei-an Temple.
It is also known as Gensei-an Temple.
It is also known as Gensei-an Temple.

sen.j: 1655年（明暦元年）日政（元政）がこの地に称心庵という庵を結んだのに始まる。
sen.e: The temple began as a thatched hut erected on this site by Nissei (Motomasa) in 1655.
The temple began as a thatched hut erected on this site by Nissei (Motomasa) in 1655.
The temple began as a thatched hut erected on this site by Nissei (Motomasa) in 1655.

sen.j: 京都府京都市伏見区深草坊町4
sen.e: 4 Fukakusabo-cho, Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture
